wp25EasterEggs-desc: A short description of the extension.

wp25eastereggs-enable-label: Label for the Birthday mode feature toggle in the Appearance Preferences page on both desktop and mobile interfaces. Includes a party emoji (ðŸŽ‰).
wp25eastereggs-enable-description: Description explaining the Birthday mode feature, shown in the mobile Settings page.
wp25eastereggs-enable-help: Help text explaining the Birthday mode feature, shown in the Appearance Preferences page on both desktop and mobile interfaces.
wp25eastereggs-enable-0-label: Label for the option to disable the Birthday mode feature.
wp25eastereggs-enable-1-label: Label for the option to enable the Birthday mode feature.
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-ti: Title of the WP25EasterEggs section in Community Configuration.
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-de: Description of the WP25EasterEggs extension configuration section in Community Configuration.
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-en: Label for the option to enable or disable the WP25EasterEggs extension globally.
Description explaining what the extension enable/disable option does.
Additional help text for the extension enable/disable option.
Label for the option to disable the extension.
Label for the option to enable the extension.
Label for the global filter type setting that controls where companion Easter eggs appear.
Description explaining the global filter type setting for companion Easter eggs.
Help text for the global filter type setting.
Label for the option to display companion Easter eggs on all pages.
Label for the option to display companion Easter eggs only on pages specified in the allow list.
Label for the option to display companion Easter eggs everywhere except pages specified in the block list.
Label for the field where administrators specify page titles for the global filter.
Description of the global filter pages field.
Help text for the global filter pages field.
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-ce: Label for the "Celebrate" state configuration section, which controls a celebratory Easter egg theme.
Description explaining the Celebrate state controls which pages can display this Easter egg theme.
Label for the setting that controls whether the Celebrate state appears on predefined pages.
Description explaining the predefined pages toggle for the Celebrate state.
Label for the option to enable the Celebrate state on predefined pages.
Label for the option to disable the Celebrate state on predefined pages.
Label for the field where administrators can specify additional pages where the Celebrate state should appear.
Description of the additional allow pages field for the Celebrate state.
Label for the field where administrators can specify pages where the Celebrate state should be blocked.
Description of the block pages field for the Celebrate state.
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-dr: Label for the "Dream" state configuration section, which controls a dreamy Easter egg theme.

Label for the field where administrators can specify pages where the Dream state should be blocked.
Description of the block pages field for the Dream state.
